name: JABACS
description:
JABACS - Just Another Ball And Chain Submission!

It's a bit wack and hopefully a bit of fun. Enjoy!

Feel free to post your times! I'd be interested to see how people go!

Controls:

W-A-S-D, Space.

It should be fairly intuitive.

Wasn't able to dedicate the whole 48 hours this year, so instead decided to see what I could throw together in a day. Spent a working day, about 7.5 hours worth of time creating this.

In-Depth Controls:

You control two balls connected by a chain: a red ball and a blue ball.

You can only control one ball at a time.

When not directly controlling a ball, it will stick to a surface of the same colour.

The aim is to have one of the balls touch the glowing purple ball at the end.
